explains: adj. 计算出的；适合的；有计划的
v. 计算；估计；打算（calculate 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: to be calculated 以…为目标；故意而为；很可能
calculated value 计算值；可计算值

sentences.en: We calculated the cost to the nearest 50 dollars.
The president took a calculated political risk in throwing his full support behind the rebels.
sentences.cn: 总统在全盘计算过后，冒着风险全力支持反叛分子。

sentences.en: Her latest play is calculated to shock.
sentences.cn: 她最新推出的剧本故意要耸人听闻。
